title: Sri Lanka Economic Crisis Live Updates: Rajapaksa’s ruling coalition loses majority in Parliament; newly-appointed FM Ali Sabry resigns - The Indian Express
content:
1. Sri Lanka Economic Crisis Live Updates: Rajapaksa’s ruling coalition loses majority in Parliament; newly-appointed FM Ali Sabry resigns  The Indian Express
  2. Sri Lanka Crisis: Anger Against President Gotabaya Rajapaksa Mounts As Protestors Ask Him To Resign  India Today
  3. Lanka's Ruling Coalition Loses Parliamentary Majority, Protests Continue: 10 Points  NDTV
  4. As economic crisis spirals in Sri Lanka, administration should desist from extending emergency powers, restricting civil liberties  The Indian Express
  5. SriLanka President Rajapaksa Calls All Political Party To Assist In Resolving National Crisis  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Sri Lanka Crisis Live News, Cabinet Resignation, President's House Clash Updates: Tendering his resignation a day after being sworn in Finance Minister Ali Sabry said, "fresh, proactive and unconventional steps" are needed to navigate this unprecedented crisis.
